DOC.brief_title: Rheumatoid Arthritis Dose Ranging Study ( 0663-086 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Patient diagnose rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) least 6 month prior otherwise judge general good health currently take nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDS ) treat his/her RA symptom Patient need stop take medication order participate , continue take his/her antirheumatic medication long stable certain period time Patients disease medical condition ( ) could worsen interfere evaluation effectiveness study medication allow participate
